package.name: Net_SmartIRC
package.summary: Net_SmartIRC is a PHP class for communication with IRC networks
package.description: Net_SmartIRC is a PHP class for communication with IRC networks, which conforms to the RFC 2812 (IRC protocol). It's an API that handles all IRC protocol messages. This class is designed for creating IRC bots, chats and show irc related info on webpages.

release.notes: This is the first release in PEAR, this project is former known as phpSmartIRCclass (beta because of first release in PEAR, the project itself is stable)
